resources.string:
This app works only with the Xposed framework.
It creates fake NetworkInfo and WifiManager objects that make other apps think they are using a WiFi even when your device is connected by other means to the internet.

Be careful when you use it, especially if you don't have an unlimited data plan!

You might need to 'force close' some apps to pick up new settings or even restart your device.

This app builds upon code from lemonsqueeze licenced under GNU GPL v3 and my app uses the same licence.

Fake Wifi
